items.name: reservationId
items.desc: A unique identifier for the reservation, consistent in all markup.

items.name: reservedTicket
items.desc: Details about the attendee’s ticketed seat.

items.name: underName
items.desc: The passenger, or a primary passenger if the event provider doesn’t require a name for each passenger.

items.name: url
items.desc: A webpage the user can access to view reservation details.
